author: jmason
msg: some new MSGID rules; re-checked-in old craig-evolve.c and copied Craig's mods to craig-evolve.c.ALTIVEC until he fixes em; merged latest bugfixes forward from b2_4_0; added bugfix to Razor code so it doesn't log errors if a dialup link to the internet closes.

msg: fixed HTML glitch: should not interpret titles found inside body

author: jmason
msg: spamd: found a linux machine with stock distro perl which could not use setlogsock(unix), so it's not just solaris anymore ;)  added more fall-back-to-inet code and added --syslog-socket switch to allow users to override it.
